subject: Re: [junit] Recursive TestRunner
msgSnippet: ... Maybe, but you need to explain what you want to do. I don t think recursive is the right word for what you mean. I have no idea what it means to execute
messageBody:
Rakesh wrote:

> Hi All,
>
> Can we run a TestSuite recursively ?
>
> I have designed a set of test cases which I have added to a TestSuite.
> Now I want to run this TestSuite recursively.
> Is there any way to do that ?

Maybe, but you need to explain what you want to do. I don't think
"recursive" is the right word for what you mean. I have no idea what it
means to execute a test suite recursively. Why does it invoke itself?
When does it stop?
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
